stimulusHtml: Dr. Wilson, who teaches engineering classes, is interested in learning about how lack of sleep affects performance. What would be the best way to ensure that her findings are generalizable to all the students at her university?
choicesHtml: Randomly assigning half the students in one of her classes she teaches at into a condition where they are told to sleep four hours a night and other half a condition in which they are told to sleep eight hours a night
Surveying every tenth student listed in the university directory about their sleep habits
Surveying all students in the classes she teaches
Studying 40 students over time, from their freshman year through their senior year, to see differences as the students mature
